last_episode_to_air.name: Bronco Buster
last_episode_to_air.overview: Lionel gets a new sweat suit whilst Tyler becomes friendly with an older woman.

name: Loiter Squad
overview: Loiter Squad is an American sketch comedy television series starring Tyler, The Creator, Jasper Dolphin, Taco Bennett, and Lionel Boyce from the Los Angeles hip hop group Odd Future. The show regularly features other members of the group as well. Jeff Tremaine, Shanna Zablow, Dimitry Elyashkevich, Lance Bangs, Nick Weidenfeld and Keith Crofford are the show's executive producers. The show is produced by Dickhouse Entertainment for Cartoon Network's Adult Swim programming block. The show's second season made its debut on March 10, 2013.

production_companies.name: The Great Wang of the Floggnaw Land

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Dr. Muhammed is the remarkable dentist with no arms; Emo Patrick posts responses to skits on YouPoop; Tyler looses a leg in a backyard bloodbath.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Thurnis Haley talks balls and soup; Xzibit refuses to pimp date's ride; Po-Po officers take down two homicidal dancers.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Lionel the Booty Hunter; the Channel 5 news presents puppies and catamarans; new D'Angelo video drops.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Thurnis recounts a tragedy; the police go after Cubans; and black-top bandages are created.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: E.T. is arrested; a basketball game takes an unusual turn; and angry ice dancers cause trouble.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Included: the perils of teen pregnancy; a sexual-harassment lesson; 1980s dating videos.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Thurnis Haley offers wisdom at a golf shop; Tyler and Lionel reimagine "Miami Vice." Also: a stunt demonstration.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Maurice learns about paternity; the guys play with fish; and Fernando gives a dance lesson.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Tennis pros meet their fans on the court; Mike G hunts a murderer; and Hodgy battles a gang.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: Included: a court battle over a video game; kung fu; "Blackass."

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: Included: a puppet fight; "The Mating Game"; a camouflage mishap.

episodes.name: Soul Food
episodes.overview: In the Season 2 premiere, Lionel tests catchphrases; Tyler trains a rookie.

episodes.name: Waiting to Exhale
episodes.overview: The guys stage a reunion and skate with Tony Hawk; Lionel wakes a pal.

episodes.name: Jason's Lyric
episodes.overview: The Po-Po need help solving a case; Blake Andersen returns; a music video debut.

episodes.name: How Stella Got Her Groove Back
episodes.overview: The guys greet an old friend; Jasper and Taco try out for a commercial; and Lionel lands the lead in the sequel to “The Blind Side.”

episodes.name: Poetic Justice
episodes.overview: The Shady Bunch go to Hawaii; Mars and Sabrina get pedicures; and Jasper offers wisdom.

episodes.name: Boyz in Da Hood
episodes.overview: The guys are incarcerated and adopted. Later, they befriend a Finnish family.

episodes.name: Menace 2 Society
episodes.overview: The guys hunt for treasure; Jasper makes a bike jump; and Earl has problems with his roommate.

episodes.name: Set It Off
episodes.overview: Tyler clashes with his stepfather; Taco cruises around in a bathtub; and the guys receive dolls with unusual powers.

episodes.name: Jungle Fever
episodes.overview: The guys stage an intervention; Jasper and Tyler have moral dilemmas; and Taco makes a change.

episodes.name: Roots
episodes.overview: Emo Patrick calls someone; the guys participate in eating challenges; and Taco shares his wisdom.

episodes.name: Sweet Chin Music
episodes.overview: The guys take it to another level with Blake Anderson; Jasper shows off his cooking skills.

episodes.name: Figure Four Leg Lock
episodes.overview: The dangers of drug use in the workplace are explored; Seth Rogen gets advice from Tyler.

episodes.name: Sharpshooter
episodes.overview: Earl searches for a roommate; Lionel shares some insight.

episodes.name: Walls of Jericho
episodes.overview: Young N**** holds a press conference and premieres his new video.

episodes.name: Rock Bottom; People's Elbow
episodes.overview: Catchphrase Jones returns; family and friends have a funeral.

episodes.name: Stone Cold Stunner
episodes.overview: Lionel and Jasper wrestle tigers; Maurice helps Mac Miller combat his phobias.

episodes.name: Razor's Edge
episodes.overview: The guys audition for roles in a movie; Left Brain has questions for people on the streets.

episodes.name: Pedigree
episodes.overview: Tatiana’s sleepover does not go to plan. Taco learns a valuable lesson.

episodes.name: Tombstone
episodes.overview: Taco becomes the smartest man in the world thanks to his sister Syd the Kyd; the guys put on the greatest show of their lives.

episodes.name: Bronco Buster
episodes.overview: Lionel gets a new sweat suit whilst Tyler becomes friendly with an older woman.
